Author: SÃ¡enz, Benjamin Alire
Book title: Aristotle and Dante Discover the Secrets of the Universe (Aristotle and Dante, #1)
Review: Wonderful! Very comfortable book. Quick read. I love the main characters and the whole book in general!

Author: Green, John
Review: I expected more from such a highly praised book - for me it was simply boring. I guess John Green is not an author for me.

Author: Black, Holly
Book title: The Cruel Prince (The Folk of the Air, #1)
Review: Very good book, kept me in suspense most of the time. I recommend it!

Author: Collins, Suzanne
Review: Interesting plot, vivid characters and great style - but it lacked "that something" to give it 5 stars. I can't wait to start reading the next volumes.

Author: Armas, Elena
Review: SWEET! I love books like this!

Author: Schwab, Victoria
Book title: The Invisible Life of Addie LaRue
Review: This is one of the best books I've read - moving, emotional and beautifully written. Very interesting and a good idea for a plot. I was not disappointed!
